solution_line_template: He has sold a total of {sold_last_week} + {sold_this_week} = <<{sold_last_week}+{sold_this_week}={total_sold}>>{total_sold} chocolate bars so far.
James needs to sell {total_to_sell} - {total_sold} = <<{total_to_sell}-{total_sold}={needed_to_sell}>>{needed_to_sell} more chocolate bars.
